We monitor the energy market to automatically get you a lower energy rate, and recommend other ways to lower costs - saving our users up to $593/yr.

Name: 7F USERS GROUP
Description:
7F Users Group, Inc. has grown dramatically since its first meeting in Baltimore, November 19-20, 1991, attended by 14 O&M personnel from four companies. The only 7F engine in service at that time was Virginia Electric & Power Co’s Chesterfield 7. It had been integrated with an existing steamer and new heat-recovery steam generator to configure a 1 x 1 combined cycle.

Fast forward to today: The OEM has shipped to customers more than 1000 F-class gas turbines since Chesterfield 7 left the shop. the majority of these units are 7FAs.

Name: TeMix Inc.
Description:
TeMix Inc. provides implementation services for a turnkey Transactive Energy System. With the TeMix platform in place you can offer customers dynamic prices, subscriptions, and buy and sell capabilities. 

Deployed our TeMix RATES Platform enables transactive services that support a profile within the TeMix standard; developed by OASIS as a part of the US NIST Smart Grid Interoperability Panel Catalog of Standards.  

For more information please see our website at  www.temix.com

Name: Influent Energy
Description: Influent Energy works nationwide to develop the most challenging distributed solar + storage projects. Our clients include regulated and unregulated power providers, natural gas companies, water companies, and large corporations. An influent is a tributary that feeds the river. Our technologies feed the grid from all sides, making everyone more secure.

Name: MaxLiner, LLC
Description:
MaxLiner offers complete CIPP solutions for lining vertical and lateral pipelines, providing the equipment, materials, supplemental products, accessories and hands-on training installers need to succeed in the small-diameter CIPP market. Our systems are proven, cost-effective and reliable alternatives to restore sanitary sewer laterals, storm drains and vertical pipes, while drastically minimizing the service disruptions and costs associated with dig-and-replace methods.

MaxLiner provides unlimited technical support from our seasoned pros, both in the field and by phone. We take pride in our unmatched customer service, support and training. Our goal is to ensure installers have the highest level of confidence in their work so that the job gets done right, every time.

Plus, we're partnered with national leader United Felts and are part of Vortex Companies, which means MaxLiner customers can easily tap into a larger catalog of trenchless solutions for any project, from geopolymers to large-diameter liners to cure monitoring systems. Together, we're United to Deliver Big.

Name: Hecate Grid
Description: Hecate Grid is an emerging force in North American energy storage.

Name: IMG Energy Solutions
Description: IMG is addressing the emerging need for reliable, innovative, and environmentally conscious energy solutions that bridge the gap to a carbon neutral energy future. We are a Developer, Owner, and Operator of Energy Assets, including solar PV and distributed natural gas projects.  IMG capitalizes on our experience and our proven designs to quickly build out high reliability, efficient base load systems for high reliability industries including critical public infrastructure, data centers and manufacturing.   IMG’s energy systems can provide multiple unit redundancy, fuel backup and can be operational in less than eighteen months.

Name: Vimocity
Description:
Vimocity is the leading solution for utilities and energy providers who aspire to prevent workplace incidents and protect their workforce.

Vimocity’s proven approach to risk mitigation ensures each member of your workforce is prepared to perform their job safely and effectively. Our platform delivers utility-specific content to ensure workers are physically ready and equipped with the knowledge and awareness to execute work safely. 

Operational and safety leaders appreciate that the content is relevant to the real-world work their teams perform and can be delivered in a variety of formats and channels based on their team’s environment. 

Get in touch to learn how utility leaders have been leveraging Vimocity to enhance safety, strengthen operations, and improve workers’ quality of life.

Name: Satokie Mining
Description: We develop and operate Bitcoin mining co-location datacenters.

Name: Smart eMobility
Description:
Smart eMobility is the fastest growing and world’s #1 PaaS platform that brings together different industry players and offers a single integrated platform to further the EV revolution. The platform, powered by the latest technologies, such as, AI, ML, and IoT Analytics, seamlessly connects energy providers, retailers, smart cities, charging stations and automotive companies with end customers.
By allowing people to better manage and control their electric vehicles, the platform allows energy providers to invest smartly and provide bundled experiences that support the delivery of seamless, more satisfying customer experiences.
The platform is significantly advancing the eMobility with right Empowerment, Automation, and Grid management. We are on a mission to build a smart ecosystem to accelerate electric vehicle adoption, build customer experience excellence, and achieve sustainability goals.

Name: Colorado Rural Electric Assn.
Description:
The Colorado Rural Electric Association is the trade association representing Colorado's electric cooperatives.  More than 1.25 million Coloradans depend on a cooperative for their electricity. Serving 70 percent of the land in Colorado, cooperatives reach every county but one. While commercial, industrial and agricultural businesses across the state rely on electric co-ops, 85 percent of co-op customers are residential.  

Colorado's co-ops serve a broad array of communities—from high country ski resorts to irrigated farmland on the eastern plains, from co-ops that serve two customers per mile of line to others that serve 18 customers per mile of line.  On average, Colorado's co-ops typically serve 7.8 customers per mile.  Compare that to investor-owned utilities that average 35 customers per mile of line and municipal utilities that serve 46 customers per mile of line.  

Co-ops are unique in that they are not for profit and owned by the members they serve.  For more information go to CREA's website at www.crea.coop.

Name: TransGard
Description:
Every year, climbing animals and birds cause hundreds of substation power outages that leave thousands without power – and cost millions in repairs. Fortunately, TransGard has developed proven solutions that currently protect thousands of substations.  

For 30 years, TransGard fences have prevented power outages from squirrels, raccoons, and snakes, among others. This specially engineered substation fencing system that delivers a humane – but effective – electric shock to climbing animals. 

TransGard also introduced Laser Bird Defense, a superior bird deterrent for the electric power industry. For decades, bird incursions at substations have resulted in equipment damage, outages and expensive cleanups due to corrosive bird droppings. The existing deterrents provide only temporary, spotty relief. 
With the fully automated Laser Bird Defense, substations can deploy an array of patterns to prevent birds from entering or nesting in substations. Birds perceive the system’s approaching laser beam as a physical danger and disperse to seek safety.   

Today, TransGard protects over 4,000 substations in the U.S. and Canada, offering critical benefits to utilities and their customers.

Name: Electra Grid Solutions
Description:
ElectraGrid Solutions is a new joint venture with PowerGrid Services, a trusted leader in the utility sector for over 35 years.  This business entity is focused on providing the power delivery market with sustainable and high-quality solutions to our partners. 


ElectraGrid Solutions is a minority/woman-owned company established by CEO Glenda S. Thomas, an experienced and esteemed leader in the utility industry and diversity and inclusion initiatives.

ElectraGrid Solutions is the ideal partner for utility companies, offering a broad range of essential, strategic services to best serve their customers.

Name: ZENNER USA
Description:
ZENNER USA, a division of the international Minol-ZENNER Group, is a manufacturer and distributor of high-quality utility meters for the measuring of utility consumption.

With more than 100 years of experience, ZENNER develops, produces and markets innovative measuring equipment for global markets. In addition to meter reading technology, ZENNER manufactures water meters for the multifamily and single family home markets, as well as bulk water meters.

Each year, the ZENNER-Group produces more than three million water meters and 140,000 heat meters worldwide. Our mission is to develop innovative products that are customized to meet the requirements of our customers.

Our water meters and heat meters are used by:
 Utilities
 Municipal water suppliers
 Energy Suppliers
 Contracting companies
 District heating companies
 Meter reading companies
 Wholesale suppliers
 Industrial companies

The innovation of ZENNER USA Water Meters today is saving the resources of tomorrow.

Name: Allumia
Description:
Allumia customers get new equipment with zero upfront costs & immediate savings. We fund, design, install, & maintain a complete energy efficiency upgrade for both our direct customers in the C&I field and our utility partner programs.

We then meter the equipment, tracking the energy savings and only billing for a portion of those proven savings on a monthly basis during a fixed contract term (typically 3-7 years).

Name: Utility 2030 Collaborative (U2030)
Description: Discover the Utility 2030 Collaborative (U2030), a vibrant and visionary membership-based community of utility leaders, vendor partners, and thought leaders working together to create a new energy and water economy. Focused on people-centered transformation at the intersection of utility customers and operational excellence, we offer Events, Programs, Insights, and Advisory Services to our members, investor-owned utilities, municipalities, and cooperatives offering energy, gas, water, and wastewater services.

Name: Stealth Power
Description:
A smarter approach to clean power and low carbon fleets. 

Our team designs and builds idle mitigation and scalable hybrid energy systems that power complex fleet operations into the future. Manufactured in the USA, Stealth Vehicle and Mobile Power Systems are trusted by FDNY, U.S. Customs and Border Protection, and the FAA to power everything from life-saving medical equipment to remote towers equipped with intelligence sensors. 

Stealth Power keeps no-fail equipment on with engines or generators turned off. This reduction of prolonged idling substantially reduces fuel usage and costs while increasing operational performance. 

Designed for EMS, Utility, Service, Military, Government, and City fleet vehicles. Our system is modular and fits any vehicle make and model.

Name: San José Clean Energy
Description: San José Clean Energy, or SJCE, is San José’s new electricity generation supplier since February 2019, providing residents and businesses cleaner energy at competitive rates. Operated by the City of San José’s Community Energy Department, we’re dedicated to creating a healthier planet for our community and future generations. Our department is led by staff with decades of experience in the energy industry and municipal utilities. SJCE plays a crucial role in Climate Smart San José, the city’s climate action plan.

Name: Kano Consultants Inc.
Description:
Kano Consultants engages in engineering assessment and compliance management for the energy and power industry. We aim to provide outstanding client service through data analytics, technical studies, and custom software development so our clients can improve their business processes and focus their resources on serving the community

At Kano, we are committed to fostering a culture of integrity, collaboration, and creativity. We understand the importance of a healthy work-life balance and believe team efficiency and productivity should incorporate flexibility. We are looking to build a dynamic team of confident and mindful problem-solvers who are excited to learn, grow, and have fun along the way!
Primary Industry: Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution

Name: Nutiliti
Description: Nutiliti is a software-based utility management platform supporting single-family, multifamily and commercial operators across the U.S.

Name: Laurustecnico
Description: Laurustecnico Energy & Utilities LLC, New York, NY, USA. Global energy and utilities solutions company, providing top-grade technological products and professional consulting services conforming to the highest international standards. Engaged in a wide range of product solutions and management services across a variety of energy domains, the company works closely with international clients to ensure highest customer satisfaction levels and to deliver cost-effective products and services. The company strictly adheres to quality checks, design parameters, safety regulations, industrial compliances and risk controls, and ensures excellence in product development and project implementations, continually strategizing its goals to focus on improving essential services that contribute to the larger objective of sustainable global energy sector development.

Name: EVolved EV Charging Solutions
Description: EVolved EV works with building owners and operators to implement EV Charging strategies for multi-family, commercial and industrial spaces. As a turn-key provider, we can help you from idea to implementation and beyond.
Primary Industry: Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution

Name: Thermal Engineering Of Arizona
Description:
TEA designs and manufactures equipment for efficient use and reuse of wastewater, energy, and heat. The company has served numerous commercial industries since 1977 – including the international laundry and textile industry.

TEA's products are built strong – using stainless steel for many components – and include remote control monitoring on key devices.

TEA's goal is to help its customers maximize profits by increasing the effectiveness and efficiency of water and energy use through recycling.

Our Cera-Pure ceramic filter membrane systems are used throughout the continental United States to filter waste water of small and large scale industrial laundry facilities. With a recovery ratio of up to 80% a Cera-Pure ceramic filter system can help a facility reduce its municipal water demand!

The TEA SmartTherm heat recovery systems extract heat from out-going waste water and transfers the heat energy to incoming fresh water.  An instant savings on process energy consumption!

A TEA SuperHeater High-Efficiency Direct Contact Water Heater is a non-boiler water heating system capable of heating fresh water with up to 99% efficiency!

Name: Think Energy
Description:
Think Energy is a retail electricity provider focusing on residential customers. We only offer fixed-rate electricity plans to protect your budget from big price changes found in variable-rate products. Think Energy makes it easy to sign up and gives you access to all the information you need to pick the right product – at the right price. Think Energy knows you have more important things to do than worry about electricity. That’s why we provide peace of mind that comes with fixed-rate electricity, and we're dedicated to helping you focus your energy where it matters most – at your home.

Think Energy delivers a range of benefits— including competitively-priced electricity, direct access to customer service professionals and products that have been designed to help you manage costs.

Name: Birch Infrastructure, PBLLC
Description: Birch Infrastructure develops, structures, owns & operates utility infrastructure on behalf of hyperscale data centers.

Name: e2Companies
Description:
e2Companies is a compliance products and services company with subsidiaries which broaden our scope, expertise, and capabilities. 

Since our founding in 2009, we have expanded our products, the extent of services, and our geographic footprint. We are the creator of the world's first Virtual Utility and a leading provider of integrated solutions for power generation, distribution, and energy economics.

We offer full indemnification for all of our products and services, including regulatory monitoring and reporting.  e2 maintains measures to meet the regulatory compliance requirements for all clients.  Most importantly, we back our work by utilizing SMEs and leading technology underwritten by risk management insurance.
Primary Industry: Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution

Name: Davidson Sales Co
Description: Established in 1987 by Ike Davidson, Davidson Sales Company is not your typical manufacturers’ representative.  In addition to providing a technical sales force covering multiple states and the Caribbean for products ranging from mobile fuel polishing equipment to medium voltage switchgear, we are a stocking distributor and light manufacturer.  Our customers are businesses in the power generation, industrial engine and the marine market.  As a factory representative, we provide the local boots on the ground to effectively represent our lines throughout our growing territory.  Under the tradename Panelsource and Gator, we manufacture control panels and fiberglass battery trays and boxes.  As a stocking distributor, we warehouse products that complement and support our factory lines and allow us to bridge the gap between the factory lead-time and immediate delivery.  Since our inception, Davidson Sales Company has focused on developing business with our customers by offering quality products, a technically trained staff and superior customer service.  It is our mission to establish long-term partnerships with our customers by offering a true source of value.

Name: Electrr.com
Description:
5,000+ Electric Vehicle Charging Stations Launching Soon Across California!

Powering the future of green mobility, we’re set to transform the EV landscape with over 5,000 state-of-the-art charging stations coming soon to California. Get ready to charge up faster, smarter, and more sustainably than ever before.

Join the movement with Electrr. Whether you're a daily commuter, fleet operator, or road trip enthusiast, our expansive network ensures you’re never far from a charge.

Stay tuned by signing up today for early access, exclusive offers, and the latest updates on our California launch. The future of electric mobility is here—don’t miss out!

Name: EASYMETERING
Description:
EASYMETETRING has been characterized throughout the years by the innovation of products that used 2G, 3G & 4G LTE networks for different applications and use cases.  

Nowadays, EASYMETERING offers an AMI solution taking advantage of the Public & Private LTE networks. 

In addition, EASYMETERING delivers a Cloud-based Service for Electric Utilities, which includes a Cloud Computing Data Center, for storing and aggregating data, making predictions, and linking to ERP systems. Assuring a consistent flow of information so that productivity may be enhanced quickly and easily, to improve quality and efficiency. 

Do you have questions? 
Contact us at www.info@easymetering.com. 

Tags: #smartgrid, #LTE, #smartmeters, #IoT, #Connectivity, #Broadband, #ElectricUtility

Name: Correlate Energy
Description: Correlate Infrastructure Partners Inc. (OTCQB: CIPI) is a publicly-traded company strategically positioned to capitalize on America’s unstoppable trend towards decentralized energy generation. The company employs a three-pronged strategy aimed at creating stockholder value from this multi-trillion-dollar trend. First, Correlate seeks to finance, develop, and profitably sell localized clean energy solutions and microgrids to industrial, commercial, and residential customers. Secondly, Correlate plans to retain ownership of some of these energy systems and thereby realize ongoing, reliable cash flow. Third, Correlate seeks to acquire proven renewable energy companies in order to exponentially grow earnings per share for investors. Correlate’s management and board consist of industry experts who, during their careers, have successfully financed, developed, and installed over two billion dollars of clean energy projects for their clients. To learn more go to: correlate.energy/investors

Name: K D Johnson, Inc.
Description:
K D Johnson, Inc. is a sales agency for electrical power products committed to providing our customers in Colorado, Iowa, Kansas, Louisiana, Missouri, Nebraska, Oklahoma and Texas with extraordinary service and to providing our manufacturers with outstanding representation. 
K D Johnson has a comprehensive line sheet offering 
world-class manufacturers in the top 3 of their respective product group providing market specific offerings.
We offer complete territory coverage with a highly respected team of well connected, motivated sales representatives from within the industry.

Name: EnergySec
Description:
The Energy Sector Security Consortium, Inc. (EnergySec) is a United States 501(c)(3) non-profit corporation formed to support energy sector organizations with the security of their critical technology infrastructures. Through our membership program, we support collaborative initiatives and projects that help enhance the cybersecurity resiliency of these organizations

Today, our community includes more than 5000 individuals representing more than 500 organizations. The development of the EnergySec information sharing efforts and workforce development remain a key focus areas of EnergySec as it continues to develop programs and other efforts to meet the needs of the energy sector into the future.

Name: Liberty Sales & Distribution, LLC
Description:
LIBERTY SALES & DISTRIBUTION, LLC  is a manufacturers' representative, distribution and manufacturing company that was established in 2004.  Liberty Sales manufactures and promotes a variety of products serving the transmission, gathering, midstream and distribution companies in the natural gas, oil and water industries throughout the United States. 

Liberty Sales is proud to distribute the industry's leading manufacturers offering a variety of corrosion protection, pipeline coatings, and coating rehabilitation products along with a compliment of casing and bridge crossing products.

Liberty Sales represents the leading manufacturer of plug/ball style gas meter valves for residential and commercial applications as well as a worldwide leader in forged, fully welded, trunnion mounted ball valves for a variety of transmission and high pressure applications.

Liberty Sales also manufactures our Liberty HD Rockshield along with our suite of pipeline marking products to protect your infrastructure including flexible and dome shaped line marker posts and test stations. 

Our offices in Hatfield and Washington, PA serve as a prime locations for the warehouse and distribution of our products throughout Pennsylvania, allowing for quick, next day delivery from stock for many of our customers.

Enrich LI Company: CMY Solutions, LLC, part of ICF
Name: CMY Solutions, LLC, part of ICF
Description:
This account is no longer active. Follow ICF for all updates.

At CMY Solutions, we are a relentlessly client-focused group who are re-imagining, re-designing, and re-engineering the way electric utilities tackle decade old problems. Our services include:

Engineering Solutions:

Protection & Control - Our team has extensive experience in setting protection relays for all varieties of power systems and can evaluate and optimize existing protection schemes along with new construction schemes.

Arc Flash Analysis - We use our clients' preferred choice of modeling and analysis software to perform studies for all voltage classes and system types and ensure all regulatory requirements are met.

T&D System Modeling - CMY can aid in building a model from scratch, verifying and updating model information, or modeling future projects which will improve the accuracy of analyses and make the model easier to maintain.

NERC Compliance - CMY will work with clients on the path to compliance, helping avoid fines while also increasing system reliability. We offer services for the following studies:
• PRC-001 
• PRC-023 
• PRC-024 
• PRC-025 
• PRC-026 
• PRC-027

Automation Solutions:

Custom Calculation Sheets - CMY develops custom calculation sheets to fit clients' needs and help standardize settings calculations to ensure relays are set to desired parameters each and every time.

CAPE & ASPEN Macros - Our developers have developed numerous CAPE macros used to increase the efficiency of several studies and have also presented some of our CAPE tools and knowledge at the Electrocon CAPE Users Group Meeting.

LiDar Data Utilization - We have developed custom tools to extract transmission line information from LiDar and PLS-CADD models to help verify the information is accurate.

Name: Open Energy Solutions Inc
Description:
Through its products and services, OPEN ENERGY SOLUTIONS INC. (OES) helps utilities and end users of electricity realize value from advanced and emerging technologies that are dramatically altering the way today's grid and markets operate.

OES was founded in December, 2016 and is headquartered in Santa Clara, California with regional offices in Spokane, Washington and Belmont, North Carolina with additional staff located throughout the United States.

OES works at the intersection of utility operational, computing, and telecom platforms. Very few entities today can seamlessly work across the operational and IT/telecom aspects of utility operations.

Name: GRIDIRON LLC
Description:
GRIDIRON’s on-site energy provides customers with power and heat that’s affordable, efficient and clean. Our co-generation products bring savings, resiliency and sustainability to a wide range of microgrids and nanogrids. GRIDIRON’s solutions can work with other microgrid inputs to provide additional electrical load offset, further savings, and enhanced protection against power outages.

Contact us to learn more about how our technology works or to becoming a channel partner.

Name: AUC Group
Description:
AUC provides both field-erected wastewater treatment plants as well as flexible, modular plants that are designed to expand as needs arise. AUC has successfully completed more than 1,500 wastewater treatment plants in our history, ranging in capacity from 5,000 gallons per day to over 1,500,000 gallons per day.

Our lease plant program is an extremely cost effective solution relative to traditional wastewater treatment plant options, costing only a small fraction of the required capital outlay. AUC will install, lease and expand facilities designed specifically to meet your wastewater treatment plant needs. We offer a variety of short and long term leasing options as well as a lease with the option to purchase and installment sale programs.

While AUC has historically focused on the Texas wastewater treatment market, the company has completed projects in other states including Alabama, Arkansas, Arizona, California, Colorado, Indiana, Louisiana, Missouri, New Mexico, and Oklahoma. In addition, we have completed projects in Mexico and El Salvador. AUC is capable of providing wastewater treatment plant solution services in all 50 States as well as internationally. With our available financing options, we are able to offer more cost-efficient wastewater solutions in every state and municipality where we build.

AUC Group has built a solid reputation of dependable, quality work with a commitment to our customers and the environment. Although our facilities have a useful life of more than 20 years, they are modular and scalable “on demand”. Our custom-designed wastewater treatment plant solutions are ready to expand as your development grows.

Name: Santa Ana Watershed Project Authority
Description:
The Santa Ana Watershed Project Authority (SAWPA) was formed in 1968 as a joint power authority under California law, composed of five member agencies; Eastern Municipal Water District, Inland Empire Utilities Agency, Orange County Water District, San Bernardino Valley Municipal Water District, and Western Municipal Water District.

SAWPA focuses on a broad range of water resource issues including water supply reliability, water quality improvement, recycled water, wastewater treatment, groundwater management, brine disposal, and integrated regional planning.

Its stated mission is to develop and maintain regional plans, programs, and projects that will protect the Santa Ana River basin water resources to maximize beneficial uses within the watershed in an economically and environmentally responsible manner.

Name: Orange County Power Authority
Description: Orange County Power Authority is your local clean electricity provider. Your choice makes a difference.

Name: PSI Technologies Inc
Description: PSI Technologies Inc is a professional representative and distribution firm specializing in the application and integration of water and wastewater equipment. Our goal at PSI is to provide unmatched quality products, services, and solutions to our customers in the water and wastewater markets. Our focus on customer service is facilitated by our team of experienced professional associates and our commitment to provide local support for the products we represent. Our team is highly trained and experienced in the specification and application of our products, having a combined industry experience of over 165 years.

Name: Tempest Storm Rentals, LLC (TSR)
Description: Your Equipment and Tool Rental Company!

Name: Avant Energy Inc.
Description:
Avant Energy, a Minneapolis-based energy management firm founded in 1984, is an innovative supplier of energy project development, management, trading, consulting and utility operations services.

We help clients manage energy cost and risk through our consulting services, energy trading, utility management and development of power plant projects.  We are a multidisciplinary firm and are able to bring a broad range of capabilities to bear on opportunities.  In addition to managers and project managers, we have professionals educated in engineering, finance, economics and law.  

Our business is built on beliefs in human dignity, mutual respect, and integrity.  We invest in people and relationships which allows us to provide our clients and customers with high value and innovative services.  We take a long-term view of both our business and our client relationships.

Our approach to business is based on thorough understanding, sound decision making, and superior execution.  Our collaborative environment develops and draws on the breadth and depth of individual talent in the larger context of meeting our organizational business needs and client expectations.

Name: ENTRA1 Energy
Description:
ENTRA1 is a global investment, development and operating platform focused on energy security assets in the energy transition. 

ENTRA1 Energy is an American independent energy production company with a global footprint.  We develop, own, finance and manage plants with a particular focus on deployment of commercially-ready SMR technology inside ENTRA1 Energy Plants to provide baseload and carbon-free energy across the production of electricity, hydrogen, process heat, and desalinated water.

Name: Hunt Energy Network
Description:
Hunt Energy Network is an affiliate of Hunt Consolidated, Inc., which is a part of the Hunt family of companies directed by Ray L. Hunt, Hunter L. Hunt and Christopher W. Kleinert. 

We aim to utilize our platform to locally balance generation and load by empowering end users with cleaner, more reliable energy while fairly compensating owners of distributed generation assets.

Name: IEC Corporation
Description: IEC Corporation is a multi-discipline engineering, design, and consulting firm dedicated to Shaping the Future of Energy. We provide complete engineering services in the electric power industry nationwide from design through implementation, construction, and operations. Our experience and continued focus is on clean and reliable renewable energy that creates a sustainable future. Please see www.iec-corporation.com for a complete overview of our innovative company.

Enrich LI Company: Applied Systems Engineering Inc., a Kalkitech Company (ASE)
Name: Applied Systems Engineering Inc., a Kalkitech Company (ASE)
Description:
Applied Systems Engineering (ASE) is a market leader in protocol test sets and gateways for Distribution Automation and Distributed Energy Resources. We have been serving utilities worldwide for more than 40 years now. 

We make Protocol Test Sets and Protocol Simulators. Our ASE2000 RTU/SCADA Test Set and ASE61850 Relay/IED Test Set are the market leader used by technicians in utilities globally. We make Protocol Gateways for Substation and DER Applications. We connect substations and DER's to SCADA Control Centers, Aggregators and Cloud Applications. We are the leading provider of IEEE 2030.5 DER Gateways, Aggregators and Servers for the Renewable Industry. 

ASE became a fully owned Subsidiary of Kalkitech in 2014.

Name: Utility Energy Services
Description:
UES is a certified Minority Owned Company supporting regulated and non-regulated customers in their program implementation efforts to save customers energy and money, transform how customers use energy and support market adoption of clean technologies.  

Energy Efficiency | Demand Response | Distributed Energy Resources | Electrification

Name: USOLN
Description:
The Utility Safety & Ops Leadership Network (USOLN) is a not-for-profit that provides members with exclusive access to unparalleled, utility safety technical expertise, professional development events, and various opportunities to network with other industry professionals. In addition to these benefits, the USOLN has established several programs and key partnerships to advance our mission of building safe and productive utility work environments and as a catalyst for the prevention of incidents.

By supporting the USOLN, you are part of the growing network of utility safety and operations professionals that advocates for a safe, secure and productive utility work environment. The USOLN provides utility safety and operations professionals with a reliable certification program, professional development opportunities and networking resources.

Name: Flagshooter Inc.
Description:
FlagShooter Inc. manufactures innovative tools specifically developed to bring safety and efficiency to the Damage Prevention Industry. 

Our first patented product, the FlagShooter, is a mechanical tool that makes marking of underground locates 40% faster and reduces the risk of costly work related injuries. 

The FlagShooter features a holder for inverted marking paint that operates with a simple squeeze of a trigger. 

No matter the terrain, from rough Texas caliche to frozen Northern tundra, FlagShooter is the fastest and safest way to flag, paint and profit. In fact, we guarantee it.

Our clients report 100% satisfaction in the ease of use and cost and time saving benefits of the FlagShooter. This tool is suitable for utility, surveying, pipeline and construction companies who want to increase productivity and profit and reduce risk.

We remain committed to delivering the highest level of customer service and developing high quality products that are safer to use, save time and increase our customers’ profit margins. Our products are manufactured and assembled in the USA and come with a 90 day money back guarantee.

Contact us today at sales@flagshooter.com or call us at 605.529.5000 for a free quote or to learn more about our 30 day demo program. 

Visit our website at http://www.flagshooter.com/testimonials to see how the FlagShooter Inc. serves the damage prevention industry.

Name: Power Line Sentry
Description: Serious power protection needs serious wildlife protection. Our line is precision-engineered, rigorously tested and lineman approved. Founded in 1998, we are committed to providing effective, durable, affordable, and easy to install power hardening solutions.

Name: G-Tower
Description:
G-Tower is a support structure (tower & pole) solutions company. G-Tower provides tower engineering, inspection, procurement and project management services to the utility scale wind, small wind, offshore wind, power transmission & distribution, lighting, solar, offshore wind and wireless industries. 

G-Tower focuses only on the support structure portion of energy projects. After its start in May of 2013, G-Tower completed several support structure projects in five continents which are North America, Europe, Asia, South America and Africa.

Name: V&R Energy
SSC Underground
Description:
Since 1969, Specialized Services Company (SSC) has been recognized as one of the Top Underground Construction Companies serving Arizona. Family owned and operated, SSC quickly grew to become a leader in underground utility installations using horizontal auger boring, micro-tunneling, and trenchless pipelining, as well as providing vacuum excavating and utility potholing services.

SSC Underground places underground utilities in locations where it’s not practical or possible to use open cutting. Our subsurface utility engineering services can deliver a utility without open cutting a road, railway, canal, freeway or even a parking lot, through the application of trenchless technology.  Our vacuum excavating and utility potholing services provide engineers, designers, and construction companies with utility locating and mapping services.  

Whatever your underground project needs, SSC can ensure your job is done right.  

For the most updated list of the services SSC Underground can offer, or to inquire about estimates, please contact us at 602-997-6164 or visit our website at www.SSCUnderground.com

Name: Quantum Biopower
Description:
Quantum’s mission is to unlock the value in organic waste and provide solutions to our partners that are sustainable and more affordable than traditional waste management methods. 

Quantum is meeting today's challenge of creating renewable energy while improving our waste management infrastructure by using our decades of experience in operation and management of organic waste diversion, reuse, and recycling.

Our flagship project, located in Southington, CT, is one of North America's longest-operating food waste-to-energy facilities.  We recycle 40,000 tons of food waste annually for our partners creating renewable energy and high-grade compost.  

Our strength comes from the members of our team who embrace a selfless mindset that fuels an honor-based culture at Quantum.  

Reach out and talk to us!

Name: Industrial Inspection Group
Description: Industrial Inspection Group is an Arizona based  certified inspection company. We specialize in ensuring your painting projects are done according to the code/specifications and completed on schedule. We are the only AMPP QP5 located in Arizona.

Name: Cybirical
Description:
Cybirical was created with one purpose: to help electric utility customers, owners, and operators address the cyber challenges of the modernized grid. No general Industrial Control System (ICS) stuff here. Our team of licensed power system engineers, certified information assurance professionals, security analysts, and software developers bring multiple disciplines together under one roof. This unique combination allows us to provide system focused services and solutions. As a professionally licensed engineering firm, we specialize in services and solutions for the design and maintenance of safe, secure, and cyber-aware power system environments.

Solutions Include:
Asset Management 
Cyber Engineering
IT & OT Monitoring
OT Digital Forensics
OT Pen Testing
Software Engineering

Name: Universal Compressed Air
Description:
UCA engineers, designs, builds, owns, operates, and maintains (DBOOM) complete systems for the worry-free supply of high quality compressed air as a utility to a variety of industries, and we provide for financially guaranteed performance & reliability, energy savings, capital preservation, and reduced environmental impact – all with a predictable, guaranteed monthly fee over a long-term agreement. This allows Customers to focus on what they do best.

Contact us today! 

info@UCAair.com

Name: Network Broadcast
Description:
Network Broadcast is a multinational leading company on the development and implementation of Digital Solutions.  With over 30 years of experience in the broadcasting and telecommunication markets, we are at the forefront developing state-of-the-art equipment.

At Network Broadcast, the customer is our priority; therefore, we seek to develop a long-term relationship based on the highest quality standards. We help our customers to meet the challenges of the revolution of digital video by offering them End-to-End global solutions to digitize UHF, Cable, Satellite, IP and OTT systems.

We analyze each project in order to adjust it to the needs of each platform, allowing future gradual expansion, and also adjusting it to the investment plan of each client. Within our Company, both the Software Development Department and the Professional Service Area play a fundamental role. They offer the possibility to customize each interface according to the needs of each customer; in addition, they provide training and expert technical advice.

We work with major technology partners worldwide, including Germany, Denmark, USA, Italy, France, Portugal and Brazil. Solvency and fulfillment of market needs turn our Company into an ongoing technology partner to the development of Digital TV.

Our customers’ reliability and the success on the projects of the main operators in Latin America guarantee ongoing improvement and a trend towards the expansion and development of new markets.
Primary Industry: Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution

Name: Matzinger Keegan, Inc. (MKI)
Description:
MKI provides technical support and sales of equipment for the electric power grid in construction projects involving generating, transmitting, protecting, and automating energy delivery.  We interact with engineering design/consulting firms, building contractors, and project owners by providing component specification assistance for electrical power equipment ranging from 480V switchgear up to 765kV substations.  

Companies we represent focus on substation, transmission, and distribution construction.  We represent several well respected manufacturing companies in the industry, providing support for the equipment they supply to our customers.  

Customers within our territory of California, Nevada, Hawaii and Guam frequently include electric utility companies, power generation plants (nuclear, coal, natural gas, hydro, solar, wind, geothermal), water/wastewater processing plants, industrial facilities, universities, hospitals, government facilities, oil/gas/petrochemical facilities, distributors, engineering consulting firms, and more.  

To insure we meet the expectations of our principals and customers, MKI maintains a team of highly experienced and educated experts drawn from the industries we serve. MKI's staff includes five electrical engineers, three MBA’s, and two professional engineers.  Our friendly team members have extensive hands-on utility, manufacturing, and testing experience to support a variety of your electrical design needs.

Name: Electricity Transmission Competition Coalition (ETCC)
Description:
We advocate for common-sense policies and solutions that require all transmission projects be competitively bid which reduce electricity costs for all ratepayers – from large manufacturers to residential consumers. 

ETCC represents a diverse group of more than 70 companies and organizations from 48 states, including manufacturing groups, retail electric consumers, state consumer advocates, public power representatives, think tanks, and non-incumbent transmission developers.
Primary Industry: Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution

Name: Bounce Energy
Description:
Bounce Energy is a Texas-based energy company that is committed to delivering value to customers through excellent customer service, innovative plans and products, and competitive pricing. Bounce Energy is a privately owned, full-service Retail Electricity Provider (REP) for residential and commercial customers in Texas.

The people behind Bounce Energy have more than 50 years of experience in energy marketing and providing outstanding customer service. Additionally, Bounce has over 30 years of ecommerce marketing experience collectively, spanning more than 30 home service categories, including energy, communications, insurance, and more.

Name: NOPEC
Description: Founded in 2000, NOPEC is a natural gas and electric energy aggregation representing hundreds of thousands of residential and small business customers in 240 Ohio communities. We use bulk-buying techniques to purchase competitively priced electricity and natural gas and then supply that power to our customers. Since 2001, we have saved our customers hundreds of millions of dollars on their energy costs. We also provide valuable programs that benefit member communities and their residents such as energy efficiency grants and community event sponsorships.

Name: Acelerex
Description:
Acelerex is a global pioneer in providing SaaS-based solutions to the challenges of integrating renewables, energy storage and electric vehicles into the 21st century power grid.

We pair emerging technologies in these key sectors with software innovations such as AI, IoT devices, blockchain, big data, data mining, cloud computing, and real time optimization algorithms.

Our clients include utilities, developers, government departments, investors, and equipment manufacturers. We work in North America, Asia Pacific, Latin America, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa.

Our software platform focuses on high-performance planning and real time optimization algorithms, AI, device control systems, data acquisition and visualization, and blockchain and smart contract applications.

Name: Alterra Power Systems
Description: Alterra Power Systems specializes in selling and servicing diesel and natural gas power generation systems for commercial and mission critical applications. We serve healthcare, manufacturing, data centers, financial, hospitality, utility, construction, water pumping/treatment, infrastructure, telecommunications, indoor agriculture, traditional agriculture and other power generation markets. Alterra Power Systems is part of the Palmer Johnson family of companies, headquartered in Madison, WI and operating in 14 states throughout the Midwest, Texas and Northwest United States.

Name: QUATRIC Acquired by TRC Companies
Description:
QUATRIC’s mission is to provide operational technology expertise, engineering services, business applications and technology solutions for operations in the Utilities and Telecommunications sectors.

Our expertise and services include: 
- Operational Technologies: Strategic Consulting, Enterprise Architecture, Systems Integration, SCADA, EMS, DMS, GMS, OMS, GIS, WFM, Engineering Tools & Custom Software Applications.
- Distribution Network Expertise: Network architecture analysis, Network Reliability and Performance Evaluation, Network Hardening, Safety and Security, Equipment implementation Strategies, Investments strategies.
- Telecommunications: Engineering, Consulting & Telecom Software Integration

Our professional team is committed to growing the company by building long-term partnerships with our clients and by delivering the best solutions and services.

Name: Minicam Inc
Description:
Minicam Inc, is the Minicam Group’s sales and service business in North America, providing manufacturers sales, training, service and support for the Minicam Group’s products.

Minicam Inc was established following the acquisition of Visual Imaging Resources (VIR) in April 2023, a business that shared our passion for providing customers with the best service and support for their pipeline inspection and maintenance equipment. Today the business offers direct sales for all of our group inspection and trenchless products, with a network of service centers across North America to provide support.

Operating as a specialized division of Minicam Inc, Minicam Trenchless focuses on the direct sales and support of Dancutter Pipeline Rehabilitation Cutters and Sewertronics UV LED Curing Equipment. The division supports customers in the trenchless rehabilitation market, using our trenchless technology to repair and maintain infrastructure in situ without the need to dig and replace, a costly and disruptive process.

Minicam Inspection, another specialized division within Minicam Inc, provides direct sales and service for Minicam’s Proteus Crawler Systems and SOLO PRO+ Push Camera Systems. This division is committed to offering high-quality inspection solutions, that are easy to use with a reputation for robustness and reliability, helping you to meet your pipeline inspection needs.

Name: North American Transmission Forum, Inc.
Description:
North American Transmission Forum (NATF) members include investor-owned, state-authorized, municipal, cooperative, U.S. federal, and Canadian provincial utilities. The NATF promotes the highest levels of reliability in the operation of the electric transmission systems.

The NATF is built on the principle that the open and candid exchange of information among its members is the key to improving the reliability of the transmission systems in the U.S. and Canada. Members recognize the operation of each member affects the operations of them all.


Community. Members recognize the interconnected electrical grid requires active member collaboration. Working together, members represent an especially agile and impactful community that propels higher levels of reliability, security, and resiliency.

Confidentiality. Various confidential programs and venues promote open, candid intra-membership dialogue. Member-specific and other sensitive information is rigorously protected, with external sharing of carefully selected information, as needed and through established protocols, to advance NATF impact.

Candor. Direct, objective performance feedback is delivered as a membership norm. Candid, constructive peer challenge promotes continuous improvement by highlighting and addressing vulnerabilities, risks, and performance shortfalls.

Commitment. Members’ senior leaders demonstrate ongoing commitment to the NATF’s mission of promoting reliability excellence. Leaders reinforce the member engagement and behaviors needed to foster positive change.

Name: Graver Water
Description: Graver Water develops, designs, supplies and services water and waste water treatment equipment for utility, and industrial applications. Our physical-chemical and specialty treatment systems range from basic pretreatment systems through highly sophisticated and advanced multi-process treatment systems. We have extensive experience and superior technical expertise in the design of condensate polishing systems for nuclear, fossil, and industrial applications.

Name: OneSpan Powerline Services, LLC.
Description:
DaVinciSKY Group, the owner operators of OneSpan Powerline Services have been industry leaders for over 25 years. The OneSpan team is a trusted leader in aerial heavy-lift operations, as we have a diverse fleet of helicopters to tackle the most complex projects with excellence, precision, and safety. OneSpan's aerial heavy lift services - with capacity of up to 25,000 pounds and precision placement capabilities - help utilities to successfully complete a multitude of projects.

OneSpan’s experienced pilots are capable of precision aft-seat placement or longline to very close tolerances in any environment. From isolated mountain tops to congested urban areas, we keep environmental impact low and the project on time with safety first. Our helicopter lift capabilities allow contractors to maximize their labor force which dramatically increases production rates. The speed and precision at which our helicopters can complete your project on time and safely is truly amazing. 

OneSpan and DaVinciSKY Engineering & Management have the most comprehensive aerial service offering in the utility industry. We provide Comprehensive Visual Inspections and Infrared Inspections on thousands of transmission lines annually. These types of inspections are more in depth and provide utilities with an array of photos of the structure to include all components and conditions. Photos are taken from the foundation to the top of the pole and notate any anomalies to include the span and guying. Our company is the only helicopter company that houses an ARC GIS and ESRI platform to transition GIS data from one format to the other. By identifying and addressing these problems early, utilities can create a predictive maintenance program that ensures a reliable infrastructure.

The benefit of using helicopters leads to efficiency in the projected work schedule, helps to mitigate environmental concerns, and produces an overall cost savings. We provide a seamless project no matter what the size.

Name: Horizon Water Solutions
Description:
Horizon water solutions. A trading company was founded in 2011, focusing on wastewater treatment chemicals, providing industries with a better, more efficient and cost-effective chemicals. 

For 13 years, Horizon water solutions has been committed to providing customized formulations and smart solutions to residential, commercial, and industrial wastewater treatment applications. With our sustainable products and commitment to excellence, we strive to meet the unique needs of each client while promoting environmental stewardship and resource conservation. Our team of experts is dedicated to ensuring the highest standards of quality and efficiency in every project we undertake. 

Today, Horizon water treatment has become an international company, practicing "focus, innovation, and customer orientation", providing innovative solutions  in UAE, Oman, and East Africa, working towards creating cleaner and healthier water for communities and industries

Name: Powerphase International
Description: Powerphase has commercialized advanced aero-thermal technology that uses air more efficiently at power plants in both the storage and production of energy. The Company's flagship product, Turbophase, is a modular air-injection system that increases the capacity and efficiency of combustion turbines. The Company's other solution is an Adaptive Compressed Air Energy Storage solution with PPI’s proprietary technologies called FastLight Storage Engine.

Enrich LI Company: Industrial Drying Solutions - An REIC Specialty Company
Name: Industrial Drying Solutions - An REIC Specialty Company
Description: Solving humidity, heating, cooling, power and moisture related challenges to the private and public sector is the sole focus of IDS. Emergency-related or scheduled, our industry experts strive to assist each customer on every job no matter how unique the situation.

Name: Southwest Utility Solutions
Description:
Southwest Utility Solutions exists for a very simple reason.  The multifamily industry is fundamentally built and sustained by the value that owners, investors, and property management teams bring to the table.  Your #1 job: building the best, sustainable, and profitable community should not be plagued with industry partners that are preventing your property from being taken to the next level.

We're building custom utility programs to ensure maximum utility recovery, savings and property profit for multifamily communities.

Name: NextCentury Submetering Solutions
Description:
Empowering Our Future: NextMeters is committed to progress and sustainability. We strive to promote the conservation of utilities for the betterment of our communities. Dedicated to revolutionizing how we measure, monitor, and manage essential resources, we envision a future where innovation and technology converge to create solutions that propel us into the Next Century.

Our team of creative and dedicated professionals thrive in our culture of innovation and learning. Join us as we unite creators to provide advanced and simple solutions that will help us navigate the challenges of tomorrow. 

Welcome to the Future of Utility Metering.

Enrich LI Company: Powertech Associates / Utility Power Supply Company
Name: Powertech Associates / Utility Power Supply Company
Description: Powertech Associates and Utility Power Supply offer the latest products and solutions available in the Utility Industry. Since its inception in 1992, Powertech has provided products for Underground and Overhead Distribution, Substations, Metering, Testing and Transmission. We are committed to meet the needs of our customers through quality product solutions and proven customer service.

Name: WMG, Inc
Description:
Founded in 1979, WMG inc. provides the nuclear industry with professional nuclear engineering and waste management services. Beginning with our industry standard RADMAN software program for radioactive shipments, WMG has continued to provide innovative solutions to the industry’s most complex challenges. WMG is well known and respected throughout the nuclear industry for its software, engineering, project, and waste management innovations and accomplishments. As a proud, independent, family-owned small-business, our employees have always been our greatest asset. Our employees are recognized experts in the industry and highly respected by clients, competitors, regulators and industry groups for their capabilities and experience.

WMG continues its legacy of developing innovative solutions, including two new services: The REACh System and the RADMAN Shipping Command Center.  The REACh System is a state-of-the-art handheld device designed to perform both in field spectroscopic radiation measurements and UHF RFID tagging of radiological objects, fully integrated with the power of the RADMAN Suite. The RADMAN Shipping Command Center is a new service that combines all the experience, capabilities, and expertise our customers have relied on for over 30 years into a singular, comprehensive service. Staffed by our shipping specialists who have at least 10 years of shipping experience, The SCC is supported by WMG’s Engineering and Software groups, so that it can manage everything from basic shipments to the most complicated characterizations.

WMG has performed projects in Canada, Europe, and at every nuclear power facility in the United States. To date, WMG has successfully completed over 2,500 projects related to the management and control of radioactive materials. 

Whatever your challenge, WMG is ready to help you find a sound and cost effective solution.

Name: Junk King Northern Kentucky
Description:
Junk King is a locally owned full-service hauling business that will remove unwanted items from your home or business.  We provide free estimates and then haul away the item(s) you want removed right then if you decide to move forward.  Outside of your typical household or business debris, we tear down sheds, playsets, hot tubs, take yard debris, basketball hoops, etc.  

What separates Junk King from our competitors is what we do with the items once we remove them. Junk King specializes in re-purposing the items that we haul by sending donations to nonprofits like Matthew 25 Ministries, Habitat For Humanity and New Life Furniture Bank. If something cannot be donated, the focus switches to finding a way to recycle it to keep landfills as clean as possible.  We are America's greenest junk removal company and take great pride in that title.

We also have 12 cubic yard dumpsters with polyfiber wheels that will not tear up your driveway.  The dumpster rental term is 3 days.  These can save you some money by doing the labor yourself and allows you time to sort through things as you go.  

Check out our reviews anywhere.  We would be GRATEFUL to gain you as a customer!

Name: Colorado 811
Description:
Know what's below, contact 811 before you dig!

Colorado's One Call center dedicated to protection of the state's infrastructure through the location of underground facilities prior to excavation.

Our Damage Report Card summary is extremely helpful for those interested in discovering  how we evaluate stakeholder responsibility.  Please visit our website www.co811.org for more information.

Name: Copperhead Industries
Description:
Copperhead Industries is the largest manufacturer of American-made copper clad steel tracer wire and tracer wire accessories, serving distributors, municipalities, utilities, and engineers in the Water, Sewer, Gas, and Telecommunication markets. We supply distributors all across the United States and various countries throughout the World. It is Copperhead’s goal to provide a product engineers can trust and ensure high quality products are going into the ground to protect the longevity of your underground infrastructure. That’s why our copper clad steel tracer wire is designed with American ingenuity and 100% of raw materials purchases, manufacturing, and final packaging are all done in the U.S.A. At Copperhead Industries, we put all of our products through rigorous testing to ensure we are putting the best products in your hands. 
Copperhead has been operating since 2004. Since then, we have been innovating products to benefit our customers and make their jobs easier. We provide a fun and welcoming atmosphere for our customers and employees. We are continuously training on new methods to provide our customers with the greatest amount of support, before, during, and after the product is installed.

Name: J&S Power
Description:
Located in Akron, Ohio, J&S POWER is a substation engineering consultant with expert knowledge in: Commissioning, and Design. J&S Power is a specialized engineering and testing firm focusing on power delivery project development, and engineering. Our commissioning engineers fill the utility sector need for system engineers. The commissioning engineers provide the independent oversight and flexibly in the field for a more reliable, on-time, and quality end product. Contact us for more information on how J&S Power engineers can be the partner in your projects.

We also provide best in class testing services and project management for complete testing coverage from the development to energization of final project.

Name: Energy Ventures Analysis, Inc.
Description:
Welcome to Energy Ventures Analysis—a world-class energy consulting firm offering in-depth knowledge and expert guidance to clients in the Electric Power, Natural Gas & Oil, Coal, Environmental and Renewable Energy industries.

Our cutting-edge expertise in energy market fundamentals, economic analysis and operational management has led our firm to international recognition. For over three decades, our innovative insights have helped clients make confident, informed investment and operational decisions to maximize value, optimize performance and spur financial growth.

Explore EVA’s full range of consulting services and learn more about how our renowned energy market publications and data can help identify solutions and expand opportunities for your business.

Name: ECG Location Georgia
Description:
Georgia is ready for business and ECG’s Office of Economic & Community Development is here to assist your company in making your move a success with economy of scale resources and a wide range of services. Our team will serve as a single point of contact while providing both timely and effective site selection assistance.

ECG is a membership organization representing the 52 electric utility communities of Georgia. Our members provide electricity to over 300,000 customers, representing more than 2,000 megawatts of electricity sold each year. MEAG Power provides reliable, competitive wholesale electricity to the majority of our members.

Our goal is to bring growth to Georgia, be it expansion, relocation or new business. Your business needs are paramount and we support your efforts to find the most suitable location for growth. We also provide support to our member communities in their individual economic development efforts including retail recruitment assistance and community development services.

Name: truCurrent
Description:
trucurrent designs, develops and deploys intelligent, distributed energy assets to the grid edge - wherever photons and electrons will go, a true current can flow.

We integrate on-site power generation with battery energy storage and controllable loads. Our energy transition services deliver enterprise transformation results to large commercial and industrial partners. Our proprietary solutions integrate PV, BESS, EVSE, and VPP technologies into smart microgrid with transactive energy capabilities. We optimize rates and monetize assets.

IF
carbon reductions = cost reductions

THEN
energy transition = competitive advantage

trucurrent officially spun-out of Distributed Sun in March, 2024.

We are well-funded. We are hiring. We are long on three innovation and value-creation cycles.
Primary Industry: Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution

Name: Electrical Grid Monitoring
Description:
EGM's Meta-Alert solution provides the information necessary to deliver electricity at the lowest possible cost - safely and reliably. 
EGM sensors measure dozens of electrical, physical and environmental parameters from across the Transmission & Distribution networks in real-time with industry-leading precision.  The sensors analyze this time-synchronized data by continuously looking for fault locations, voltage irregularities, pre-failure signature, theft and dangerous situations across the grid.  The EGM solutions help reduce SAIDI and SAIFI, mitigate wildfire risk and improve grid reliability and resiliency.

Name: San Bernardino Valley
Description: The San Bernardino Valley Municipal Water District is a State Water Contractor, and wholesale water provider in the San Bernardino Valley. By importing State Water Project water, managing groundwater, and building collaborative projects, Valley District is contributing to the long-term success off the region.

Name: Pumpjack Power
Description:
Pumpjack Power is an Option 2 Retail Electric Provider offering  wholesale electricity sales and customized service options for the Oil & Gas industry operating within the Texas ERCOT market.

Our Mission is to empower our customer(s) by providing industry specific knowledge and services that will allow them to lower operational expenses and maximize related returns.

Name: TRUSTED ENERGY, L.L.C.
Description: TRUSTED ENERGY, L.L.C. is a company based out of Storm Lake, Iowa with offices in Grinnell and Clinton Iowa.  Specializing Solar and Wind services as well as renewable energy project development.

Name: Citizens Utility Board (Illinois)
Description:
The Citizens Utility Board, or CUB, is a nonprofit, nonpartisan consumer watchdog group that advocates for utility customers in the state of Illinois. CUB was created by the Illinois General Assembly in 1983. Since opening its doors in 1984, CUB has helped saved Illinois consumers more than $20 billion by blocking rate hikes and securing refunds for consumers.

Consumer hotline: 1-800-669-5556

Enrich LI Company: WEST USA, Inc. (Water Energy Systems & Tests)
Name: WEST USA, Inc. (Water Energy Systems & Tests)
Description:
Powering the Future with Integrity | W.E.S.T. USA, Inc.

W.E.S.T. USA, Inc. is passionate about bringing innovative solutions to the world of power plants (focus on hydroelectric) and excited to connect with like-minded professionals.

At W.E.S.T. we don’t just design and engineer power plant solutions; we redefine what it means to support and empower our clients throughout their journey. With a comprehensive suite of services—including testing, start-up, controls, commissioning, operations and maintenance, and consultancy—we are positioned as a pivotal resource in the renewable energy sector.

Our team collaborates closely with customers from the initial design phase through to final acceptance checks, ensuring we understand and address the unique challenges involved in power plant construction, testing, start-up, and operations and maintenance. As an impartial partner, W.E.S.T. leverages cutting-edge control systems technology and industry expertise to provide balanced, reliable, and safe services that help optimize outcomes.

With a customer-centric approach at the heart of our operations, we pride ourselves on delivering excellence that extends beyond expectations. We believe in fostering long-term relationships based on trust, transparency, and the mutual goal of sustainable power generation.

W.E.S.T. is always open to discussions that drive innovation in the energy sector! Whether you’re interested in collaboration, seeking insights, or looking to share ideas about the future of electric power, feel free to reach out.

Together, let’s power a sustainable future!

#Hydroelectric #CleanEnergy #PowerPlants #PowerSystems #EnergyConsultation #Sustainability #WEST

Name: M&R Energy Resources
Description:
We at M&R Energy Resources know that delivering true energy value requires financial discipline, market insight and a dedication to customer service. Our team’s commitment to controlled, sustainable growth has helped M&R Energy earn its reputation as New York’s proven choice in natural gas and electric procurement and delivery – reliable, secure, always placing our customer relationships first.

As a fully licensed ESCO (Energy Services Company, approved in 2002 by the New York State Public Service Commission), we proudly serve residential, commercial and industrial customers within the Con Edison Company of New York, Public Service Electric and Gas (PSEG), Orange and Rockland Utilities, and Central Hudson Gas and Electric operating areas. We look forward to becoming your trusted energy adviser, as well.

M&R Energy Resources was certified in 2005 as a Women/Minority Owned company by the Women’s Business Enterprise National Council. Our headquarters are based in Cornwall, New York.

Name: Blade Platforms
Description: Blade Platforms has many years of experience providing Truck Mounted Aerial Work Platform rentals, Spider Platform rental, truck mounted lifts and access solutions globally. We are North Americas leading Supplier of aerial work platforms.

Name: Wagner Technical Services, Inc.
Description:
For more than 22 years, Wagner Technical Services Inc. has provided its utility industry customers (both utilities and contractors) with such critical services as electric and gas distribution design, work order preparation, drafting, estimating, inspections, and custom software development. 

Our clients include Northeast Utilities, Orange & Rockland Utilities, Central Hudson Gas & Electric Corporation, United Illuminating, and New York Power Authority.


With our experienced field-savvy staff, advanced in-house technology, deadline and detail dependability, we are the “go to” choice for utilities looking to outsource technical projects. We have effectively completed thousands of projects, large and small, including electric and gas distribution design work orders, inspections, and software applications – on budget, on target, and on time.

Our services include: 

- Design Work Order Packages for Electric Distribution Projects
- Storm Hardening
- Gas Distribution Design and Inspection
- Cable TV and Fiber Make-Ready Design
- New Services, Overhead and Underground
- Storm Damage Assessment
- Underground Residential Distribution (URD) Design & Inspection
- Electric Transmission Inspection
- Plant Relocations for State, County, and Municipal Projects
- Electric Underground and Networks

Name: AIQUEOUS
Description: At AIQUEOUS, our mission is to amplify the positive impact our utility clients have on their communities. Through our products - POWERPATH, WaterWays and ECOiQ - our vision is to become the platform of choice for utilities of the future. We solve our utility clients' challenge of fragmented and separated data systems and provide a secure customer and partner engagement platform. Visit our website to learn more!

Name: San Bernardino Valley Municipal Water District
Description: The San Bernardino Valley Municipal Water District is a State Water Contractor, and wholesale water provider in the San Bernardino Valley. By importing State Water Project water, managing groundwater, and building collaborative projects, Valley District is contributing to the long-term success off the region.

Name: Bellawatt
Description:
Your electric customers are real people trying to understand the benefits and challenges of EVs, solar, storage, DR, VPPs, energy efficiency, and how much it's all going to cost.

We help you reach, educate, onboard, and keep customers happy with groundbreaking digital tools that simplify the electrification journey. Behind the scenes, we are a mix of software and energy industry veterans that have been launching user-friendly digital solutions for utilities & energy transition companies for nearly a decade.

Name: Vrinda Inc
Description:
Vrinda Inc. is a Business and Technology transformation firm based out of New York. We are currently focused on Energy, Utility and Road Transportation sector. We provide cutting edge business solutions to our Energy & Utility sector clients  in the area of Strategy & Operations, Renewable Energy development and Integration, Smart Grids and Utility Analytics.  We provide Technology consulting in the area of road network integration and utility Analytics. 

We are trusted advisors to the our clients based on our Our ability to innovate, adapt to changing markets. Vrinda Inc. was founded in 2010.

Name: BARC Electric Cooperative
Description:
BARC, a member owned Electric Cooperative, located in Millboro, Virginia, serves over 12,500 consumers in Bath, Rockbridge, Alleghany, Highland and Augusta counties.  With over 1950 miles of line, BARC's service territory stretches from the Blue Ridge parkway on the East to the West Virginia line.

 As a member owned Electric Cooperative, BARC operates on money borrowed from the Rural Utilities Service, which is a branch of the U.S. Department of Agriculture, and on margins earned from its member owners.  These margins are allocated to the members based on their usage at the end of each year and returned to the member over time.  As member owners, the folks who pay the bills have a say in how the co-op operates through the Board of Directors.

Name: Alpha Power Group, LLC
Description:
Alpha Power Group is a Certified Minority and Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Business founded in 2021 to provide the construction industry with a dedicated and sophisticated service workforce. 

Alpha Power is a premier market leader in offering professional services, with experts available to deploy around the United States for Consulting, Professional Services and Construction Services.
